Redwood_City.KZDG:
KZDG (1550 AM; "Radio Zindagi") is a radio station in San Francisco, owned by Entercom and programmed by Cinemaya Media. KZDG features talk and music programming targeted to the Bay Area's Indian population.


== Format ==

Radio Zindagi started in 2011 on KZDG as a successful South Asian radio format, with concentration in Bollywood and Indian American affairs.
